column2: Our supremacy in Iberia depended on land and political power. Here we must develop something I choose to call §Ydesert§! power.
Proclaim §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! to be the Kwisatz Haderach
Proclaim this character as the Kwisatz Haderach, the ultimate goal of the Bene Gesserit breeding programme.
Could §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! be the one we've been waiting for?.
This character is the legendary Kwisatz Haderach.
As the realm expands, new delicacies are constantly arriving at our court. Why not try some of this §Yspice§!?
A strange woman dragged me into a room and forced me to do a painful test
Could this boy truly be the one we have been waiting for? We shall need to test his will with the Gom Jabbar to be sure...
Let us say I suggest he is human
Now that we have a new succession law, we should re-evaluate our inheritance
